sentences.english: Emma could now imagine why her own attentions had been slighted.
sentences.chinese: 愛瑪現在想象得出，爲什麼她的關心屢屢受到輕慢。

sentences.english: Other missives suggest a cavalier attitude to the rules.
sentences.chinese: 其他信件則暗示了對法規的輕慢態度。

sentences.english: It was a miracle that Vanessa didn't get upset over my slighting her boyfriend.
sentences.chinese: 瓦妮莎竟沒有在乎我對她男朋友的輕慢。

sentences.english: Wherefore doth the wicked contemn God? he hath said in his heart, Thou wilt not require it.
sentences.chinese: 惡人爲何輕慢神，心裏說，你必不追究。

definition: virtue has its rewards (idiom); one good turn deserves another
variant of 輾轉|辗转[zhan3 zhuan3]
scramble for power and profit (idiom); power struggle
lit. draw legs on a snake (idiom); fig. to ruin the effect by adding sth superfluous/to overdo it
strict law/cruel punishment/to carry out cruel law rigorously
the State of Qǐ in modern Qǐ county 杞縣|杞县, Henan (c. 1500-445 BC), a small vassal state of Shang and Western Zhou for most of its existence
